typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)

attributes.type: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)

collateralDebt(address).details: uses the existing cumulative rate. Call `refreshCollateral()` on `VaultsCore` to make sure it's up to date.

params._collateralType: address of the collateral type (Eg: WETH)

returns._0: total debt of the platform of one collateral type

createVault(address,address).details: only the vaultsCore module can call this function

params._collateralType: address to the collateral asset e.g. WETH
params._owner: the owner of the new vault.

debt().details: uses the existing cumulative rate. Call `refresh()` on `VaultsCore` to make sure it's up to date.

setBaseDebt(uint256,uint256).details: only the vaultsCore module can call this function

params._id: Vault ID of which the base debt will be updated
params._newBaseDebt: the new base debt of the vault.

setCollateralBalance(uint256,uint256).details: only the vaultsCore module can call this function

params._balance: the new balance of the vault.
params._id: Vault ID of which the collateral balance will be updated

returns._0: address for the collateral type of the vault

vaultDebt(uint256).details: uses the existing cumulative rate. Call `refreshCollateral()` on `VaultsCore` to make sure it's up to date.

params._collateralType: address of the collateral type (Eg: WETH)
params._owner: address of the owner of the vault

returns._0: vault id of the vault or 0

params._id: The vault's ID to be retrieved

returns._0: struct Vault { address collateralType; address owner; uint256 collateralBalance; uint256 baseDebt; uint256 createdAt; }

collateralDebt(address).notice: Calculated the total outstanding debt for all vaults of a specific collateral type.

debt().notice: Calculated the total outstanding debt for all vaults and all collateral types.

setBaseDebt(uint256,uint256).notice: Set the base debt of a vault.

setCollateralBalance(uint256,uint256).notice: Set the collateral balance of a vault.

vaultBaseDebt(uint256).notice: Get the base debt of a vault.

vaultCollateralBalance(uint256).notice: Get the collateral balance of a vault.

vaultCollateralType(uint256).notice: Get the collateral type of a vault.

vaultDebt(uint256).notice: Calculated the total outstanding debt for a specific vault.

vaultExists(uint256).notice: Checks if a specified vault exists.

vaultId(address,address).notice: Retrieve the vault id for a specified owner and collateral type.

vaultOwner(uint256).notice: Get the owner of a vault.

vaults(uint256).notice: Get a vault by vault ID.
